landing.title: Predict your visa outcome with AI precision
landing.subTitle: Advanced AI-powered predictions for the UK and Schengen tourist visa applications.

aiPowered.text: Advanced machine learning algorithms analyse your application data.

accuracy.title: 95% Accuracy
accuracy.text: High prediction accuracy based on extensive historical data. Tips on improving your chances.

results.title: Instant result
results.text: Get your visa application prediction in seconds, not days.

secure.title: Secure
secure.text: Your data is encrypted and protected with enterprise-grade security.
